Summary: Bright, star-like object moves quickly west to east, zig-zag/wobbling
divs: sighting detailsi was going up stairs to go to bed, and stopped mid-way on the stairs for a minute to look out the window and up at the sky. the sky was clear, with a not-quite full moon to the south, and i saw several small twinkling stars and a plane in-flight with the usual blinking navigation lights. there are large maple trees across the street from my house, but a good portion of the open sky is visible between the tops of the maples and my vantage point at the window. as i looked at the sky, i spotted what appeared to be a very bright star, as large or slightly larger than the planet venus would appear. as i looked at it, i realized it was moving and thought maybe it's a satellite. it traveled directly from the west, i guess about as fast as a plane, but this had no blinking lights, and i heard no sound (the window was open slightly, and this being a small town on late sunday night, you could hear a pin drop). i thought, "how odd" and realized it would fly directly over my house, and if i hurried up the rest of the stairs and into the spare bedroom, maybe i could see it from the window on the east side of the house. so i hurried and got to the window (all the while thinking this is nuts, it's 11:30 and i really need to get to bed). i looked at the sky, expecting to see this object continue on it's way toward the east or northeast, but had to wait 10 or 15 seconds. suddenly there it was - and as it passed overhead and continued on (and the sky is still clear at this point, and my vantage point is clear - no obstructions) i watched it and realized it was not moving in a smooth\straight fashion. it made slight zig-zag movements to the left and right; i imagined driving my car and rapidly jerking the steering wheel would make the same movement. i have seen satellites move across the sky and i believe they are much faster, smaller and not as bright as this object. and i don't think they move erratically like this thing did. i have seen a number of ufos before (large moon-like object, small red bullet shapes, disc that made a rapid 90-degree turn) but this type is new to me. the wobbly-ness of it, brightness, and lack of navigation lights\sound made me think - ufo! i watched it until i could no longer see it because of the trees on the horizon.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chelsea
There were no other sightings in Chelsea on or around June 12th 2011
